subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The defending champion AC Milan moved into the second round of the European Champion League with a 1-1 tie at Benfica, and Chelsea advanced with a 4-0 victory at Rosenborg. Two other qualifying groups were wide open, and half the 16-team field for the second round will not be decided until the final games. Liverpool eased some of the pressure on Coach Rafael Benítez with a 4-1 victory over Porto, and Real Madrid hurt its chances with a 3-2 loss at Werder Bremen.
